name: Hook (itch) (rickylee)
description:
Thanks for taking a look at my game :) This is a short demo of a larger concept. Game duration <30min
Recommended: Headphones & Gamepad Aside from some Freesound.com SFX/Ambience, everything here is original work. Made in 17 days for Metroid Vania Month \o/ 
Most of the effort was put into the player controller/mechanics, and a lot was stripped down to fundamentals in order to meet the deadline. Audio Imbalance 

- If it feels like some audio is relatively loud compared to everything else, try going back to main menu and reloading.

Made With:

Unity
Aseprite
Bosca Ceoil
Chiptone
Audacity
